verify.title: Check your email
verify.message: A sign in link has been sent to your email address.
verify.closeMessage: You can close this tab or go back to

configuration.title: Server error
configuration.message: There is a problem with the server configuration.
configuration.Extra: Check the server logs for more information.

Verification.title: Unable to sign in
Verification.message: The sign link is no longer valid.
Verification.extra: It may have been used already or it may have expired.

AccessDenied.title: Access Denied
AccessDenied.message: You do not have permission to sign in.
